All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseEvent
Abstract base class for domain events providing common functionality.
ChannelProvider
Enumeration of external service providers used for notification delivery.
ChannelType
Enum representing the various notification delivery channels supported by the system.
CreateNotificationRequest
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a request to create a new notification.
CreateNotificationRequest.Builder
 
CustomerIdValidator
Validator for customer ID fields annotated with ValidCustomerId.
CustomerInfo
Value object representing customer information relevant to notification delivery.
DeliveryAttempt
Immutable value object representing a single delivery attempt of a notification.
DeliveryAttempt.Builder
 
DeliveryFailedException
Exception thrown when a notification fails to be delivered through a given provider or channel.
DeliveryStatus
Enumeration representing the status of a delivery attempt in the notification system.
DeliveryStatusResponse
Response DTO that encapsulates the delivery status information of a notification.
DomainEvent
Base interface for all domain events in the notification system.
JsonUtils
JSON utility methods for notification processing.
NotificationConstants
Centralized constants used across notification services, including Kafka configuration, headers, timeouts, retry logic, rate limiting, template variables, and defaults.
NotificationCreatedEvent
Domain event fired when a new notification is created in the system.
NotificationDeliveredEvent
Domain event fired when a notification has been successfully delivered to the recipient.
NotificationEventDto
Data Transfer Object representing a notification event sent through Kafka.
NotificationEventType
Enum representing the types of notification events supported across the platform.
NotificationException
Base exception class for all notification-related errors.
NotificationFailedEvent
Domain event fired when a notification delivery attempt fails.
NotificationPriority
Represents the priority levels for notifications which affect delivery order, timing, and retry behavior in the notification system.
NotificationResponse
DTO class representing the response of a notification operation.
NotificationStatus
Represents the various states a notification can be in throughout its lifecycle.
NotificationUtils
Utility class providing common helper methods for notification processing.
TopicConstants
Kafka topic names and configuration constants used by the Notification Service.
TopicConstants.Config
Contains Kafka topic configuration constants.
TopicConstants.DeadLetter
Contains constants for dead letter queue (DLQ) topics, used to handle message processing failures.
TopicConstants.Input
Contains constants for Kafka topics from which the Notification Service consumes messages.
TopicConstants.Output
Contains constants for Kafka topics to which the Notification Service publishes messages.
ValidCustomerId
Custom annotation for validating customer IDs.
